page.title: 11Housing:Owlsmoor/Crowthorne
page.content: {OWLSMOOR} Owlsmoor was part of Crowthorne parish. The few old houses date from the early 1920's. In the late 1960's some council flats and houses were built. The greatest phase of building has been in the late 1970's and is still going on. Several hundred private dwellings have been built. {CROWTHORNE An attractive mixture of semi- detached and detached owner occupied houses and bungalows are set in tree- lined roads.The latest addition has been the development of blocks of sheltered flats for senior citizens. Some 19th. century terraced cottages have survived in the High Street and on the Broadmoor Estate where Broadmoor Hospital provides a variety of rented accomodation for its staff and their families.
